series.title: The Little Determined Vacuum Repairman

episodes.title: Eureka : How much dirt can a eureka vacuum pick up
episodes.shortDescription: Eureka : Purchased from a local vendor and then the vacuum died
episodes.longDescription: It's the challenge, buy - Fix it , then possible keep it or send it back into ciruclation

series.shortDescription: I have been collecting them since I was little, now I can tinker and fix them
series.longDescription: For myself I like the challenge of buying a vacuum and seeing if I can get it to work. If I like it long enough, it becomes part of my room otherwise it's restored and back into circulation for either Goodwill or Salvation Army. But sometimes, I found a really good deal on OfferUp
